reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made and incredibly soft, with a classic front detail that looks more expensive than its price point.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater I will order again!
items.body: Love this turtle neck! Fabric is soft and very nice! Washes well! I do not put it in the dryer though! Color was just what I was looking for! It holds its shape! I would recommend maybe sizing a size down! But even at this it sits a little longer on me and looks nice with my leggings! It’s a nice weight and you can dress it up or just wear it with your jeans and you will look stunning! Price is very good! Read more
items.author: Kathy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Sweater, Get It!
items.body: Love this turtleneck sweater! The nutmeg color is beautiful in person, same as pictured. It’s softer than I anticipated. I’m approximately 5’5”, 185 lbs, 38DD/36 waist/44 hips, more of an hourglass figure. Bought the XL - fit and length are perfect for me, looks great in the chest area! It hits me right about lower hip/upper thighs to cover my lower belly and most of my tush. I kind of tuck the band under with jeans or dress pants, but could wear it with a flattering, shapely pair of leggings too. I like my sweaters about this length as I don’t like the cold winds blowing up my back in the winter. It’s loose enough to be comfortable but just firm fitting enough for me to accentuate my curves without drawing attention to my trouble spots. If you like a more snug sweater then size down. It easily tucks in your pants as well. Not too thick but still a warm weave. The turtleneck is not tight at all and very flattering if you’re starting to get an old lady neck like me. It washes really well (machine cold, dry flat), and keeps its shape. I don’t remember a smell out of the bag with this one, but if it had one from the heat during transit (as I did buy it a few weeks ago when it was still warm out), it definitely does not now after washing. I always wash my new clothes before wearing because one allergic reaction to new clothes without washing first was enough for me. I like it so much and the color was so on point that I have been thinking about buying it in the olive green too. I highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Twila

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and classy.
items.body: I ordered this for myself in a medium and liked it so well that I’ve ordered it for gifts for Christmas. It is well-made and soft and holds its shape well. I’ve had lots of compliments on it. I wear a medium in most tops and it fits me perfect. Read more
items.author: Rusty Britt

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits well, soft and comfortable
items.body: Luxurious, soft to the skin, fits comfortably. May buy another one in another color. Read more
items.author: Alexa Porter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: Beautiful, quality feel sweater! Perfect weight! Not heavy, but still some warmth. Testure and print are lovely. Fit was true to size for me. Read more
items.author: Nic4syth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s perfect!
items.body: I love this sweater! Great fit Not too long Very comfortable I love this brand, have purched this brand before (pearl white sweater , coat etc! Read more
items.author: patti

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A staple for any wardrobe!!
items.body: Comfortable, stylish and a perfect color, I may have to buy several more sweaters in different colors. Perfect for layering a T-shirt underneath, but thick enough to wear on its own in the cold, Pacific Northwest weather. It’s neither bulky or too heavy under a coat. It washed up wonderfully in the washing machine, used the dryer for 10 minutes and then hung it up without any wrinkles or fuzzies. I am 5 foot eight and weigh 150 pounds and the medium fits perfect. I love that. The sleeves are long enough.!! Read more
items.author: KG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and Elegant
items.body: Love this sweater! Very soft and flattering fit. A little loose the first time that I wore it, but thankfully washing did not result in shrink. The material isn't very thick but I stay warm all day. Love how soft and loose the neck and collar are. It's super easy to get over my head without destroying my hair in the process. Definitely going to buy a few more colors! Read more
items.author: Alycia

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gray, Nutmeg, V-brown, Blue, Army Green, Hot Pink, Pink Gray, Black, V-green, Dark Apricot, Dark Green, Lake Blue, Wine Red, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
